SUITE.NAME: All specs in spec: ticketee Coverage Results
All tests in spec: ticketee Coverage Results

task.summary: Only editors, managers and admins can create tickets
Only editors, managers and admins can create tickets
Hide the New Ticket link when the user can't create tickets on the project
Restrict tagging to only authorized users
Add the ability for users to remove tags from tickets
Users may now search for tickets by state or tag
Give more details about the ticket in email body
Automatically subscribe users to a ticket when they comment on it
Add button so users can toggle watching on a ticket

MESSAGE.value: Only editors, managers and admins can create tickets
Hide the New Ticket link when the user can't create tickets on the project
Restrict tagging to only authorized users
Add the ability for users to remove tags from tickets
Users may now search for tickets by state or tag
Users can now click a tag's name to go to a page showing all tickets for it
Give more details about the ticket in email body
Automatically subscribe users to a ticket when they comment on it
Add button so users can toggle watching on a ticket
